question: Devadas Kanakala, who passed away recently, was the veteran actor of which regional cinema?
explanation: Devadas Kanakala (75), the veteran Telugu actor, has passed away in Hyderabad on August 3, 2019.  Hailed from Yanam (neighbouring East Godavari district of Andhra Pradesh) in Pondicherry,  Kanakala began his career about five decades ago. He acted in about 100 films and would be best remembered for ‘O Seetha Katha’, ‘Siri Sirmuvva’, ‘Gorintaku’ and ‘Gang Leader’. He was also well-known to have trained South Indian megastars - Rajinikanth, Chiranjeevi and Rajendra Prasad - through his film institute.
